name: SHERLOCK_OSINT__INVESTIGATE_USERNAME
description: Investigate a username across multiple social media platforms and websites using Sherlock. Returns raw QueryResult objects for each site checked, including status (CLAIMED/AVAILABLE), URLs, query times, and context information.

username.description: The username to investigate across social media platforms and websites.

include_nsfw.description: Whether to include NSFW/adult sites in the search (default: false).

max_sites.description: Maximum number of sites to check (default: all sites). Use to limit investigation scope.

site_names.description: List of specific site names to check (e.g., ['Twitter', 'Facebook', 'Instagram']). If not provided, all sites will be checked.

strict_filtering.description: Whether to apply strict filtering to reduce false positives by analyzing response content (default: true).

only_positive.description: Whether to only return claimed accounts and skip negative results to minimize data size (default: true).

name: SHERLOCK_OSINT__GET_SUPPORTED_SITES
description: Get a list of all supported sites and platforms for username investigation. Returns site names, URLs, categories, and NSFW flags to help understand investigation scope.

include_nsfw.description: Whether to include NSFW/adult sites in the results (default: false).
